problem_text: In \triangle G H J, H P = 5 x - 16, P J = 3 x + 8, m \angle G J N = 6 y - 3, m \angle N J H = 4 y + 23 and m \angle H M G = 4 z + 14. If H M is an altitude of \angle G H J, find the value of z.
compact_text: In \triangle GHJ, HP = 5x-16, PJ = 3x+8, m \angle GJN = 6y-3, m \angle NJH = 4y+23 and m \angle HMG = 4z+14. If HM is an altitude of \angle GHJ, find the value of z.
annotat_text: In $\Delta G H J$, $H P=5 x-16$, $P J=3 x+8$, $m \angle G J N=6 y-3$, $m \angle N J H=4 y+23$ and $m \angle H M G=4 z+14$. If $\overline{HM}$ is an altitude of $∠GHJ$, find the value of $z$.
